subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Brad Guzan made several key saves, including one on a penalty, in his first Copa America appearance but could not get to Jaime Castrillon’s 14th-minute header as the United States lost, 1-0, to Colombia.
snippet: Brad Guzan made several key saves, including one on a penalty, in his first Copa America appearance but could not get to Jaime Castrillon’s 14th-minute header as the United States lost, 1-0, to Colombia.
